title: Authentication with Email Login Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using email and password with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid email and password.
Click on login button.
Verify user is successfully logged in and redirected to home/dashboard.

title: Authentication with Email Login Failure
description: Verify that login fails with invalid email or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid email or incorrect password.
Click on login button.
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed and login is not successful.

title: Authentication with Phone OTP Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using phone number OTP authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to phone login page.
Enter valid phone number.
Request OTP and enter the received valid OTP.
Submit OTP for verification.
Verify successful login and navigation to user dashboard.

title: Authentication with Google OAuth Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully authenticate using Google OAuth login.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Click on Google OAuth login button.
Complete Google OAuth flow with valid Google account.
Verify user is successfully authenticated and redirected to dashboard.

title: Guest Mode Access
description: Verify that users can access the platform in guest mode with limited functionality without requiring login.

steps.description: Navigate to application.
Select guest mode option.
Verify access to browse marketplace and requests without login but restricted from creating or managing requests/offers.

title: Create New Request Using AI Assistant
description: Verify that users can create a new request using the AI assistant with accurate and helpful suggestions.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Navigate to create request page.
Use the AI assistant (Anthropic Claude or Google Gemini) to formulate the request.
Review the AI-generated request details and submit.
Verify the request is created with correct data and visible in user's requests.

title: Create New Request Using Manual Form
description: Verify that users can create a new request using the manual input form without AI assistance.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Navigate to create request page.
Fill out the request details manually and submit.
Verify the new request appears in user's requests and contains the entered information.

title: Edit Existing Request
description: Verify that the user can open and edit their existing request and changes are saved correctly.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Navigate to my requests page.
Select a request and open edit mode.
Modify request details and save changes.
Verify the request details are updated as per the changes.

title: Archive and Unarchive Request
description: Verify archiving a request hides it from active views and unarchiving restores it correctly.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Navigate to my requests page.
Select a request and archive it.
Verify the request is no longer visible in active requests list.
Navigate to archived requests.
Unarchive the same request.
Verify the request reappears in the active requests list.

title: Hide and Bump Request
description: Verify that a request can be hidden and later bumped (prioritized) to appear at the top.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Navigate to my requests.
Hide a request.
Verify the request is hidden from normal views.
Perform bump action on the hidden request.
Verify the request is restored to visible list with top priority placement.

title: Browse Requests with Filters
description: Verify marketplace requests can be filtered accurately by category, city, and budget.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace page.
Apply filters for specific category, city, and budget range.
Verify only requests matching the filters are displayed.

title: Switch Marketplace View Modes
description: Verify that users can switch between different view modes (all requests, interests) seamlessly.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace page.
Switch to 'all requests' view mode.
Verify all requests are displayed accurately.
Switch to 'interests' view mode.
Verify only requests marked as interests are displayed.

title: Submit Offer on a Request using AI Assistant
description: Verify that providers can create and submit offers on requests using AI assistance.

steps.description: Login as service provider.
Browse and select a request.
Use AI assistant to draft the offer.
Submit the offer.
Verify that the offer appears in the offers list for the request.

title: Submit Manual Offer on a Request
description: Verify providers can create and submit offers using manual input without AI assistance.

steps.description: Login as provider.
Select a request from marketplace.
Fill in offer details manually and submit.
Verify that submitted offer is saved and visible.

title: Edit and Archive Offers
description: Verify that users can edit their submitted offers and archive/unarchive them correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to my offers.
Select an offer and edit its details.
Save changes.
Verify offer details are updated.
Archive the offer.
Verify offer is hidden from active list.
Unarchive the offer.
Verify offer is restored to active list.

title: Initiate and Conduct Negotiation
description: Verify negotiation flow between requester and provider including chat, updating terms, and completing deal.

steps.description: Requester accepts an offer to start negotiation.
Both parties exchange messages asynchronously.
Update offer terms within chat/offer interface.
Requester or provider finalizes the deal.
Verify negotiation status changes appropriately and chat saves conversation.

title: Real-time Messaging Functionality
description: Verify that instant messages between requesters and providers are sent, received, and displayed in real-time with file exchange support.

steps.description: Login as requester and open chat with provider.
Send text message.
Verify provider receives and sees the message immediately.
Send a file attachment.
Verify file is delivered and downloadable.

title: In-App Notifications with Sound and Badge Count
description: Verify that new notifications for offers, messages, and system events trigger sound alerts and increment unread badge counters.

steps.description: Perform actions that trigger notifications (new offer received, new message).
Verify notification appears inside app.
Verify distinct sound plays for notification type.
Verify unread notification badge counter increments correctly.

title: User Profile Settings Update
description: Verify that user can update profile preferences such as theme (dark/light), language (Arabic, English, Urdu), and interests.

steps.description: Login and navigate to profile settings.
Toggle theme mode from light to dark and vice versa.
Verify UI theme changes accordingly immediately.
Change application language from Arabic to English and Urdu.
Verify UI text changes to the selected language and right-to-left support is applied for Arabic and Urdu.
Update user interests.
Verify interests are saved and reflected in relevant sections.

title: Multi-language Interface and RTL Support
description: Verify the UI renders properly in all supported languages (Arabic, English, Urdu) including right-to-left layout for Arabic and Urdu.

steps.description: Set language to Arabic.
Verify entire UI layout is right-to-left with correct text alignment.
Set language to Urdu.
Verify UI is right-to-left with proper font rendering.
Set language to English.
Verify UI is left-to-right and text is properly aligned.

title: Google Maps City Autocomplete and Search
description: Verify that city search input uses Google Maps API autocomplete and returns accurate city suggestions.

steps.description: Navigate to the city input field in request creation or filters.
Type partial city name.
Verify Google Maps autocomplete suggestions appear.
Select a city suggestion.
Verify the selected city populates input correctly.

title: Security: Data Encryption and Access Control
description: Verify that sensitive user data such as passwords and personal info are encrypted in storage and proper access controls prevent unauthorized data access.

steps.description: Attempt to access user data via API endpoints without proper authentication.
Verify access is denied with proper error.
Login with valid credentials.
Check stored password data via backend or database.
Verify passwords are stored encrypted and not in plain text.

title: Performance: Fast Loading Times and UI Responsiveness
description: Verify application pages load within acceptable time thresholds and UI interactions respond smoothly under normal and high load.

steps.description: Load main pages such as login, marketplace, and request details.
Verify pages load fully within 3 seconds on typical broadband connection.
Perform rapid navigation and interactions like switching views and opening dialogs.
Verify UI responds smoothly without lag or freezing.

title: Error Handling: Global Error Boundary
description: Verify that the app displays user-friendly error messages and fallback UI when unexpected errors occur.

steps.description: Manually trigger an unexpected error in the UI (e.g., simulate failed API call or component exception).
Verify that error boundary catches error and displays fallback UI with a helpful message.
Verify user can reload or navigate away without app crash.

title: Notification Badge Count Reset on Reading
description: Verify that unread notification count resets properly when user views notifications.

steps.description: Generate multiple notifications while user is logged out or idle.
Login and view notifications panel.
Verify unread badge counter stops incrementing and resets to zero after notifications are viewed.

title: File Upload in Messaging
description: Verify that users can upload and send files in messaging, and recipients can download or view attachments.

steps.description: Login as user and open a chat.
Upload a supported file type and send it.
Verify file is uploaded successfully and appears in chat.
Login as recipient and open the chat.
Verify recipient can download/view the file attachment.
